metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000038 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, a stack buffer overflow in functionpdf_lookup_cmap_full in pdf/pdf-cmap.c could allow an attacker to executearbitrary code via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
